# VEHICLE::SET_DISABLE_PRETEND_OCCUPANTS

## Summary
Disables a vehicle pretend occupants, Ped inside will not be removed and always rendered

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** val
